skills.name: Surging Brilliance
skills.description:
The next attack deals 260% ATK as physical damage and restores the HP of a nearby ally for 150% of Blemishine's ATK
Can store 3 charge(s)

skills.name: Deterring Radiance
skills.description: ATK +110% and all ground enemies within the same tile as herself are put to Sleep(affected enemies are Stunned and Invulnerable); Restore the HP of all nearby allies by 20% of Blemishine's ATK every second

skills.name: Divine Avatar
skills.description: ATK +110%, DEF +60%; Every attack deals an additional 100% ATK as Arts damage and restores the HP of a nearby ally besides herself for 100% of Blemishine's ATK

talents.name: Knight of Sword and Shield
talents.description: When deployed, allies that have a Defensive Recovery skill also gain 1 SP when attacking

talents.name: Mercy
talents.description: Blemishine can attack and will prioritize Sleeping enemies; Increase ATK to 144% <@ba.talpu>(+4%)</> when attacking Sleeping enemies
